title: [Maaghara Labyrinth]
description: The surface of the surrounding walls is mottled and bumpy, harboring a collection of putrid green mold clusters that sweat a translucent slime.  The ooze drips downward in thick rivulets, lending a glistening sheen to the walls.  Tiny iridescent stalks sprout from the clusters, each waving about frantically at the slightest sign of movement.
